Dark Beckoning.name: Dark Beckoning
Dark Beckoning.flavor: Your mesmerizing presence draws your enemies closer.
Dark Beckoning.onHit:
1d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you pull the target up to 3 squares.
    Level 21: 2d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage.

Taste of Life.name: Taste of Life
Taste of Life.flavor: Your dread touch burns your foe with dark power, even as your own energy is temporarily restored.
Taste of Life.onHit:
1d8 + Dexterity modifier necrotic damage, and you gain temporary hit points equal to 2 + your Charisma modifier.
    Level 21: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier necrotic damage.

Vampire Slam.name: Vampire Slam
Vampire Slam.flavor: You use the full force of your undead strength to drive your foe back.
Vampire Slam.onHit:
1d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you can push the target 1 square.
    Level 21: 2d10 + Dexterity modifier damage.
Vampire Slam.special: You can use this power as a melee basic attack.

Blood Drinker.name: Blood Drinker
Blood Drinker.flavor: When your attack strikes true, you sweep past your foe’s defenses to consume the essence of its life.
Blood Drinker.trigger: You hit an enemy with a vampire melee at-will attack power.
Blood Drinker.effect:
The target takes 1d10 extra damage from the triggering attack, and you gain a healing surge.
    Level 17: 2d10 extra damage.
    Level 27: 3d10 extra damage.

Swarm of Shadows.name: Swarm of Shadows
Swarm of Shadows.flavor: Your body becomes a swarm of batlike shadows that let you harry your enemies, then fade from sight.
Swarm of Shadows.onHit: 3d6 + Dexterity modifier damage, and ongoing 5 damage (save ends).
Swarm of Shadows.effect: You teleport to a square in the blast and are invisible until the end of your next turn.

Charming Gaze.name: Charming Gaze
Charming Gaze.flavor: Your compelling demeanor throws your prey off its guard, lulling it into a false sense of security.
Charming Gaze.effect: Until the end of your next turn, the target cannot make opportunity attacks or take immediate actions. In addition, you gain a +4 bonus to the next Bluff check or Diplomacy check you make against the target before the end of the encounter.

Hunter's Gaze.name: Hunter's Gaze
Hunter's Gaze.flavor: As you focus on a foe, your predatory presence leaves it open to attack.
Hunter's Gaze.effect: Until the start of your next turn, the target grants combat advantage while you are adjacent to it. In addition, you gain a +4 bonus to the next Intimidate check you make against the target before the end of the encounter.

Feral Assault.name: Feral Assault
Feral Assault.flavor: You howl like a beast as you strike, your hunger and fury driving you to make a brutal attack.
Feral Assault.special: You can lose a healing surge when you use this power to either target a second creature or deal 2d8 extra damage with the attack.

Strength of Blood.name: Strength of Blood
Strength of Blood.flavor: You draw on the life force you have consumed to grant yourself a sudden burst of strength.
Strength of Blood.effect: You gain a +5 power bonus to the next Athletics, Endurance, or Strength check you make before the end of your turn.
Strength of Blood.special: You can lose a healing surge when you use this power to increase the bonus to +10.

Unfettered Hunger.name: Unfettered Hunger
Unfettered Hunger.flavor: Your eyes turn red with fury, your fangs lengthen, and you rage like a beast as you allow your hunger to seize control.
Unfettered Hunger.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and a +4 power bonus to damage rolls, you can shift up to your speed as a move action, and you cannot spend healing surges to regain hit points.

Form of the Bat.name: Form of the Bat
Form of the Bat.flavor: Your body becomes a cloud of pure shadow that shrinks and coalesces into the form of a fluttering bat.
Form of the Bat.effect: You assume the form of a Tiny bat. While you are in this form, you have a speed of 2 and a fly speed of 8, and you cannot make attacks or hold or carry any object. Your equipment becomes part of this form. You use a move action to return to your normal form.

Domineering Gaze.name: Domineering Gaze
Domineering Gaze.flavor: With a glance, your foe falls under your control and will yield up its life force to strengthen you.
Domineering Gaze.onHit: The target is dominated (save ends). While the target is dominated by this power, you can use a minor action while adjacent to the target to gain a healing surge and to deal necrotic damage to the target equal to your healing surge value. Doing so ends the domination.

Gaseous Form.name: Gaseous Form
Gaseous Form.flavor: You transform into a shadowy mist that shreds and twists away from your enemy’s grasp.
Gaseous Form.effect: You assume a gaseous form. While in this form, you are insubstantial and phasing, gain a fly speed of 8, and gain a +10 power bonus to Stealth checks. You cannot attack in this form. The form lasts until the end of your next turn or until you use a minor action to end it.
Gaseous Form.sustainMinor: The gaseous form persists until the end of your next turn.

Hungry Swarm.name: Hungry Swarm
Hungry Swarm.flavor: Your body unravels into a swarm of batlike shadows whose claws and fangs steal sight and life from your foes.
Hungry Swarm.onHit: 5d6 + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is blinded (save ends).
Hungry Swarm.effect: You teleport to a square in the blast and are invisible until the end of your next turn. If you hit at least one living creature with this attack, you gain a healing surge.

Shared Blood.name: Shared Blood
Shared Blood.flavor: You bite yourself to let the life energy you have consumed seep onto your ally, transferring some of your undying vitality.
Shared Blood.requirement: You must have at least one healing surge remaining.
Shared Blood.effect: You lose a healing surge. The target regains 1 hit point, gains temporary hit points equal to his or her bloodied value, and can make a saving throw with a +2 power bonus.

Unleashed Fury.name: Unleashed Fury
Unleashed Fury.flavor: You become a ravening beast, lashing out at your foe with the strength of all your dark rage.
Unleashed Fury.special: You can lose a healing surge when you use this power to either target each creature adjacent to you with the attack or deal 3d10 extra damage to a single target.

Blood Drinker's Pounce.name: Blood Drinker's Pounce
Blood Drinker's Pounce.flavor: Your successful attack inspires even greater fury, letting you leap through your foes like a snarling beast.
Blood Drinker's Pounce.trigger: The target of your blood drinker power is bloodied or reduced to 0 hit points by that power’s triggering attack.
Blood Drinker's Pounce.effect: You shift up to your speed and can move through enemies’ spaces during this shift. You then use vampire slam with a +2 bonus to the attack roll. If you hit, you also knock the target prone.

Culling Call.name: Culling Call
Culling Call.flavor: As one foe falls, your dark presence pulls another enemy forward to become an offering for your hunger.
Culling Call.trigger: You reduce an adjacent enemy to 0 hit points on your turn.
Culling Call.effect: You use dark beckoning against an enemy within range. If you hit with that power, you also gain combat advantage against the target until the end of your next turn.

Irresistible Gaze.name: Irresistible Gaze
Irresistible Gaze.flavor: Your enemy gives up its will and its life force to you, stumbling through the battle under your command.
Irresistible Gaze.onHit: The target is dominated (save ends). Once while the target is dominated by this power, you can use a minor action while adjacent to the target to gain a healing surge and to deal necrotic damage to the target equal to your healing surge value. Doing so ends the domination.
Irresistible Gaze.aftereffect: The target takes ongoing 10 psychic damage and is dazed (save ends both).

Consuming Swarm.name: Consuming Swarm
Consuming Swarm.flavor: The swarm of shadows into which you transform drains the life from your foes, then wraps you in a shroud of invisibility that endures while you attack.
Consuming Swarm.onHit: 7d6 + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is blinded (save ends).
Consuming Swarm.effect: You teleport to a square in the blast, and the blast creates a zone that lasts until you leave it. While in the zone, you are invisible, and you can use a free action at the start of each of your turns to teleport to a square in the zone. In addition, if you hit at least one living creature with this attack, you gain a healing surge.
